title: Knightgaming PREMADE Teams Tournament almost closing Today!!!!
body:
Knightgaming NA Premade Teams Tournament Today!!!

Come Join us to play in our tournament and win free RP Today! Registration closes at 6:45 pm CST and drafting starts at 7pm CST ,Here is the Battlefy info: https://battlefy.com/knight-gaming-tournaments/knights-gaming-tourny-111017/5a0613f09033cb0355031f56/info?infoTab=details get in and ask us anything you need. See you there!

There is the discord LINK https://discord.gg/96qPz6T our discord link will also be linked on battlefy if this link expires.

YOUR PRIZE: 1st place team gets $10 RP.
MVP (one from the 2end place team) get $10 RP.

HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!

replies.body: You will have more success posting here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/
